About This Property
Avail 9/1- Great 5 bed / 2 bath apartment with in unit laundry, central air, and balcony in convenient Lower Allston location with balcony near Boston Landing. Walking distance to Harvard's Allston Campus, Trader Joe's, Brighton Mills, parks, library, restaurants and shops in Lower Allston! Features include: central air, in unit laundry, dishwasher, hardwood floors. Rent includes water and sewer. Tenants pay gas, electricity, wifi/cable. Easy resident permit street parking.
